text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
She must have laughed when she heard people say this was no place 
for a queen.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Dark hair blowing in the wind, she danced into the lead as if it were a 
game. All anyone could do was bow before her majesty.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: This queen's name was Vodka.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
She turned everyone's dream into her own glory. And her eyes shone 
with the light of a future which no one had ever seen.

The season passes into autumn, finally bringing the day of the 
Solefall Faire.

The exhibit I prepared with Winning Ticket becomes a big hit at the 
event.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And then, and then! Check out this Derby—it was so moving! Right, 
Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Okay, okay. Just show it to us nice and slow.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You did well to make such a fine exhibit while also training for your 
races.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I was sooo busy. But my trainer helped, and we got through it 
somehow!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, yeah! I haven't introduced anybody yet!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: This is my trainer! And this is Taishin and Hayahide!

Narita Taishin and Biwa Hayahide. Classmates of Winning Ticket's, 
they all made their debuts around the same time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hi. So… you must have your hands full with her.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. I can imagine babysitting Ticket is quite the challenge. To 
think, she even roped you into assisting with the exhibition.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Come ooon! Is that what you two really think of me?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You've got it backwards! Trainer came to help me with the exhibit 
first!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Two people preparing a Derby exhibit team up to win the Derby—that's gotta be fate. FATE!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and speaking of fate, that reminds me! You remember the 
promise we made when we first met, right?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: The one we made in our first training class?

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
All right, everyone, to begin with, we're going to time your runs. I'd 
like you all to pick a distance that suits your aptitude, and measure 
your times.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, oh, Instructor! Can I run 2,400 meters, just like the Derby?

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Uh, yeah… It's up to you. But new students usually start with about 
half that.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I know! But my goal's the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Um, all right then… I'll ask just in case—does anyone else want to run 
2,400 meters?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Me…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I would like to run 2,400 meters as well.

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text: Really?! Are you all serious?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff… Wheeze… I-I can't do iiit! My time is way too slow!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text: 2,400 meters… Running a classics distance is no simple task.

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
You should work on mastering some basics first and improve to the 
point where you can run the whole thing.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Pant… Huff… U-understood…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'll do it one day…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I will master this distance…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Heh… Ehehe! Hey, you two! Thanks for running with me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I didn't do it for you, so don't thank me. That's just the distance I aim 
to run someday.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's simply a distance one must be competent in to become a great 
racer.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I knew it! You're both going for the Derby too! Three students in the 
same class with eyes on the same goal…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaagh! What a story! Let's all race in the Derby togetheeer!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ack! Wait… Why're you crying?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Our race'll be one for the history books! The most heated, dramatic 
Derby ever!

Ticket's eyes shine brightly as she recounts the tale of how they took 
the first step toward their dreams together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Aaall right! Let's make that promise one more time! All together now! 
One, two… DEEERBYYY!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? You didn't say it!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
The curator of this exhibit is starting to annoy me. Let's go somewhere 
else.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I believe there's entertainment on the outdoor stage.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whaaat?! Hold on!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: We're just kidding. But really, I need to get to training soon.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Training? Right in the middle of the Solefall Faire?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Taishin's running in the next race.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, right! You know I'll be there rooting for ya, Taishin!
She's training for her race even during a school event…

Contrary to Narita Taishin's gruff exterior, she's actually quite 
disciplined.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then let's go one more time to get in the spirit! One, two… 
DEEERBYYY!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I told you, that's annoying!
Several days later.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're around the fourth corner and Narita Taishin is in second! But 
wait! The other racers are close behind!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishiiin! Go! YOU CAN DO IT!
Ticket's fervent cheers prove futile, and Taishin places sixth.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hey, Ticket…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: D-don't worry about it! We'll train for the next one together!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, but don't bother trying to cheer me up. I wanna be alone right 
now.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh… Uh, sorry…

Three good friends all aim to win the Derby. But this race serves as a 
bitter reminder that the path to achieving such a dream is a bumpy 
one.
